error_request_canceled: The request to the server was canceled
connection_failed_check_internet: @:connection_to_server_failed, please check your internet connection and try again.
check_settings_description:
1. Check is connected to the Wi-Fi network properly
2. Check the machine's connection settings (IP address & Port)
convert_picture_description:
Follow these steps to convert the image into a printable file:
1. Click the “Convert Image” button to open the website.
2. Click “Choose File” at the top left of the screen.
3. After uploading the image, click the “Upload” button.
4. After uploading the image, click on “Generate grcl gcode” on the right part of the page.
5. After converting the image, click the “Download gcode” button to download the file to your device.
6. Make sure the download is finished, then close the page and return back to the application to complete the rest of the steps.
pick_file_description: Select the file from your device (make sure the file is in "ngc" or "gcode" format).
sending_file_to_machine: Sending the file to the machine..
